products.title: Vibe Taupe
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Vibe Taupe Standard Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 500mm Max Drop: 4000mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.title: Vibe Grey Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Vibe Grey Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Vibe Silver Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Silver Trance Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.
